channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024090845
item.description:
Report X-2024090845

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-15T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-12
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS PORTLAND FACILITY WE RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED FOUR X ONE GALLON CANS OF FLAMMABLE CLASSIC EXPRESS STAIN WITH ONE CAN LEAKING. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM SOUTH CAROLINA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER J5H558, WHITE, 4115 DORCHESTER RD, NORTH CHARLESTON SC 29405-7466.

item.title: Report X-2024090790
item.description:
Report X-2024090790

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-15T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-30
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE TO RESPOND TO LEAKING PACKAGE IN UNLOAD. RESPONDER BAGAN DMP PROCESS OF LEAKER AND AFFECTED DEBRIS. AFTER CARDBOARD WAS CONTAINERIZED INTO DMP BAG, BAG BEGAN SMOKING AFTER BAG POPPED OPEN. THE SMOKE STOPPED. RESPONDER NOTIFIED RMP. RMP INSTRUCTED CONTENTS TO BE CORDONED OFF OUTSIDE. BAG BEGAN SMOKING A SECOND TIME WHEN OUTSIDE. RMP NOTIFIED SORT MANAGER AND CALLED FOR OUTSIDE RESPONSE TEAM. WHILE BAG WAS OUTSIDE, IT EVENTUALLY CAUGHT FIRE. ALL CONTENTS CONTAINERIZED BY OUTSIDE RESPONSE TEAM AND PLACED IN SHED 2 FOR FWN PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024090589
item.description:
Report X-2024090589

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-12T09:14:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-29
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS PICKED UP AND TAKEN TO THE PSC FOR FURTHER INSPECTION. IT WAS THEN DISCOVERED THE PACKAGE WAS NOT THE SOURCE OF THE LEAKER, BUT A POTENTIAL UNDECLARED HAZMAT AS THEY WERE 12 LAPTOPS AND NO LITHIUM-ION BATTERY LABEL ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. HMSC WAS CALLED AND THE UNDECLARED PROCESS WAS STARTED. REWRAP; PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE IN THE SORT; NO DAMAGE TO LAPTOPS

item.title: Report X-2024090341
item.description:
Report X-2024090341

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-10T09:23:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-03
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: INSPECTED CONTENTS OF AN AIR PACKAGE SHIPPING IN A STYROFOAM COOLER DUE TO THE SOUND OF DRY ICE ROLLING AROUND BEING HEARD. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING TWO SMALL BOTTLES OF EYE DROPS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER STYROFOAM COOLER. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM OREGON USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 96949X, THE CASEY EYE INSTITUTE, 545 SW CAMPUS DR, PORTLAND OR 97239-3130.
